attributes.action: scrap the proposed increase in car tax for existing car owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The planned increase in car tax should only apply to new cars purchased after a certain date. Why should I be penalised for something I have had no choice over? Like may thousands of others, I am currently in a credit agreement and cannot sell my car for a newer, less polluting model.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "scrap the proposed increase in car tax for existing car owners."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20339


Prime Minister's Office
